subtitle: de l'esquisse au colossal
contributions: Musée d'art et d'industrie de Roubaix.
title: Carlo Sarrabezolles, 1888-1971
by_statement: [commissariat général de l'exposition, Bruno Gaudichon ... et al.].

notes.value:
Published on the occasion of an exhibition held at La Piscine, Musée d'art et d'industrie de Roubaix, June 21-Sept. 20, 2008 and 4 other venues through winter 2010.

Includes bibliographical references (p. 190-191).
